definitions.definition: a building for keeping one or more cars or other vehicles in

examples.text: a double garage *(= one for two cars)*
a house with a detached/an attached/an integral garage
an underground garage *(= for example under an office building)*
Don't forget to put the car in the garage.
Did you shut the garage door?

definitions.definition: a place where vehicles are repaired and/or where you can buy a car or buy petrol and oil

examples.text: I had to take the car to the garage.
The car's still at the garage.

definitions.definition: a style of rock music played with great energy but not necessarily great technique, popular in the 1960s
a type of electronic dance music with elements of drum and bass, house music and soul

wordOrigin: early 20th cent.: from French, from garer ‘to shelter’.
